featureDescription: A component that makes an SVG smoothly follow the mouse cursor.

params.description: (type: number), Scaling factor for the SVG size
(type: number), Controls how visible the SVG is (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully visible)
(type: number), Defines how smoothly the SVG follows the cursor (lower = faster)
(type: string), The easing function applied to the animation. See GSAP easing options
